Dame Prudence Margaret Leith, DBE (amụrụ 18 February 1940  ) bụ onye Britain-South Africa  onye nwere ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ, onye osi nri, onye na-agbasa ihe onyonyo / onye mgbasa ozi, onye nta akụkọ, onye ode akwụkwọ gbasara isi nri na onye edemede
Ọ bụ onye ji ọkwa Chancellor nke Mahadum Queen Margaret, Edinburgh
Ọ bụ onye ikpe n'ihe ngosi BBC a kpọrọ Great British Menu afọ iri na otu, tupu ya abanye na Great British Bake Off na March 2017, ebe ọ nọchịrị Mary Berry, mgbe ihe omume telivishọn kwagara Channel 4
A mụrụ Leith na Cape Town, South Africa
Nna ya, Sam Leith, rụrụ ọrụ na African Explosives, mpaghara nke ụlọọrụ ICI, na-emepụta dynamite maka iji mee ihe na ogbunigwe, ma mesịa jee ozi dị ka onye nduzi
Nne ya, Margaret 'Peggy' Inglis, bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri

Site na afọ ise ruo mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asaa, Leith gara St Mary's School, Waverley, ụlọ akwụkwọ nke onwe nke Bekee ebe a na-ebi ebi, maka ụmụ agbọghọ nọ na Johannesburg nke ndị nọn Anglican na-elekọta. O sonyere klas nke mbụ wee pụọ  wee gụọ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Cape Town, ebe ọ na-agbasoghị usoro ọmụmụ ihe ọ bụla ogologo oge na ihe nkiri, nkà ọma, ụkpụrụ ụlọ ma ọ bụ French
O mere ka nne na nna ya kwenye ka ọ gaa Sorbonne (nke a na-akpọbu, Mahadum Paris ), na-atụ anya ka ọ mụta French nke ọma mgbe ọ na-amụ Cours de Civilization Française
Mgbe ọ nọ na Paris, ọ mechara chọpụta na ọ chọrọ ịrụ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ nri.
Na 1960, Leith kwagara London ịga Cordon Bleu Cookery School wee malite azụmahịa nke inye nri ehihie dị mma
Nke a tolitere wee bụrụ 'Leith Good Food', ụlọọrụ na-eje ozi oriri na ọṅụṅụ na mmemme dị iche iche
N'afọ 1969, ọ mepere Leith's, ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ Michelin ya na Notting Hill, nke o mechara ree na 1995
Na 1975, o hiwere Leith's School of Food and Wine, nke na-azụ ndị ọkachamara n'isi nri na ndị na-achọ imuta nka isi nri
Ndị otu ahụ nwetara ego ruru nde pound iri na ise na 1993, nke o mechara ree
Na 1995, o nyere aka ihiwe Prue Leith College (ebe a kpọgharịrị Prue Leith Chef's Academy) na South Africa.
Nwanyị mbụ a họpụtara na Board of Railway British na 1977, ọ malitere imeziwanye isi nri nke a katọrọ nke ukwuu
Ngalaba nri, Travelers Fare, kewapụrụ na azụmahịa ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ na 1982, ebe e kere ụlọ ahịa ọhụrụ nke gụnyere Casey Jones na Upper Crust
N'otu oge ịchịkwa l azụmahịa ya, Leith ghọrọ onye na-ede akwụkwọ nri nke gara nke ọma maka, Daily Mail, Sunday Express, The Guardian na Daily Mirror

E wezụga ide akwụkwọ iri na abụọ gbasara iri abụọ nke gụnyere Leith's Cookery Bible, o deela akwụkwọ akụkọ asaa: Leaving Patrick, Sisters, A lovesome thing, Choral Society, A Serving of Scandal, The Food of Love: Laura's Story na The Prodigal Daughter
Akwụkwọ abụọ ikpeazụ a bụ ụfọdụ n'ime usoro akụkọ Food of Love E bipụtara akwụkwọ ndekọ ya, Relish na 2012.
Ngosipụta telivishọn mbụ ya bụ na 1970 dị ka onye na-egosi usoro ihe nkiri abụọ nke nwéré ihe nkiri iri na atọ nke ezubere maka ụmụ nwanyị n'ụlọ, nke Tyne Tees Television mere
Ọ bụ onye nnọchi anya nkeji ikpeazụ maka Jack de Manio, enweghị ahụmahụ na onye nduzi nke nwere mmasị na ihe niile edere, gụnyere ajụjụ ọnụ, ahụmahụ ahụ amasịghi ya

Mgbe e mesịrị, na 1980s, ọ bụ isiokwu nke ihe omume telivishọn abụọ gbasara ndụ ya na ọrụ ya: ihe omume mbụ nke Channel 4 a kpọrọ Take Six Cooks na nke BBC a kpọrọ The Best of British, usoro gbasara ndị ọchụnta ego na-eto eto
Na 1999, ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị kọmishọna na Channel 4's Poverty Commission

Ọ laghachiri na telivishọn ka ọ bụrụ onye ikpe na Great British Menu maka afọ iri na otu ruo 2016 na onye ọka ikpe maka ihe nkiri 'My Kitchen Rules', nke ọ hapụrụ iji wee nọchie Mary Berry na Great British Bake Off
O tinyela aka na nri na agụmakwụkwọ
Mgbe ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Royal Society of Arts ọ tọrọ ntọala ma bụrụ onye isi oche nke ọrụ ebere Focus on Food (nke bụ akụkụ nke Soil Association ugbu a) nke na-akwalite isi nri n'usoro ọmụmụ
Ọ malitekwara, na ọrụ ebere 'Training for Life', the Hoxton Apprentice;  ụlọ oriri na ọñụñụ na-adịghị akwụ ụgwọ maka afọ iri zụrụ ndị na-eto eto na-enweghị ọrụ ogologo oge
Tupu afọ 2015, ọ bụ onye otu nri nke ntọala inye onyinye, Esmée Fairbairne

Site na 2007 ruo 2010, ọ bụ onye isi oche nke School Food Trust, ụlọọrụ gọọmentị na-ahụ maka mmelite na nri ụlọ akwụkwọ mgbe ihe onyonyo Jamie Oliver kpughere ọnọdụ dị imere ebere nke nri ụlọ akwụkwọ na steeti ahu
Trust (ugbu a Children's Food Trust) guzobekwara ma na-achikwa otu 'Lets Get Cooking', otu ọgbakọ nwere ihe karịrị klọb nri pụkụ ise n'ụlọ akwụkwọ steeti, nke ọ bụ onye na-elekọta ya

Ọ bụ osote onye isi oche nke The Sustainable Restaurant Association;  onye nlekọta nke Njem Taste Baby (ọrụ ebere agụmakwụkwọ metụtara nri dị mma maka ụmụ ọhụrụ); Onye nlekọta nke Institute for Food, Brain and Behaviour, Mgbasa Ozi Nkwado Maka Nri Ụlọ Ọgwụ Ka Mma, na Prue Leith Chef's Academy na ala nna ya South Africa.

Ọ nọkwa na-arụsi ọrụ ike na agụmakwụkwọ izugbe, ma bụrụ onye isi nke Ashridge Management College (2002–07); Ụlọ ọrụ 3E (ụlọ ọrụ agụmakwụkwọ na-atụgharị ụlọ akwụkwọ dara ada ma na-achikwa ụlọ akwụkwọ (1998-2006) na Onye isi oche nke Gọvanọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Kings College na Guildford (2000-07).

O tinyekwala aka na ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ dị iche iche: ọ chịkwara otu ndị Restaurateurs Association (1990–94); ọ bụ onye otu ndị na-etinye ego na ndị mmadụ na-arụ ọrụ; ọ chịkwara Royal Society of Arts (1995–97); na Forum for the Future (2000-03)

Ọ bụ onye isi otu ụlọ obibi nke a kpọrọ, 'Places for People' (1999–2003) yana onye otu Consumer Debt Working Group nyere aka na akwụkwọ amụma afọ 2006 nke Conservative Party a kpọrọ Breakdown Britain (2004–05)
Ọ bụkwa otu n'ime ndị na-akwado Brexit, na-agbachitere nhọrọ ya, n'agbanyeghị na-ekwupụta nchegbu na nso nso a maka iwetu ụkpụrụ nri

Mgbe ọ nọ na RSA, o duuru mgbasa ozi na-aga nke ọma iji jiri plinth efu, nke a maara ugbu a dị ka Plinth nke anọ, na Trafalgar Square iji nọrọ n'ụlọ na-agbanwe ihe ọkpụkpụ ma ọ bụ nrụnye site n'aka ndị na-ese ihe n'oge a.

Leith arugo ọrụ dịka onye na-abụghị onye isi nchịkwa nke British Rail ; Ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ nke British Transport ; Safeway ; Argyll plc, Leeds Permanent Building Society ; Whitbread plc, Woolworths plc, Halifax ; Triven VCT; Omega International plc; na Belmond Hotels Ltd (nke bụbu Orient Express Hotels) ma bụrụ onye nduzi na onye na-etinye ego n'ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ mmalite.
Na July 2017, etinyere ya dị ka Chancellor nke Mahadum Queen Margaret, Edinburgh
Leith lụrụ onye edemede Rayne Kruger, onye ya na ya nweburu mmekọrịta afọ iri na atọ,  site na 1974 ruo ka ọ nwụrụ mgbe ọ dị afọ iri asa na December 2002
Di na nwunye ahụ nwere ụmụ abụọ, otu nwoke na otu nwa nwanyị
Nwa ha nwanyị, Li-Da Kruger (onye nkuchi Cambodia), bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri
Nwa ha nwoke, Danny Kruger, bụ onye na-ede okwu na onye ndụmọdụ David Cameron,  ma bụrụkwa onye MP Conservative maka Devizes kemgbe Disemba 2019.
N'October 2016, Leith lụrụ John Playfair, onye nrụpụta akwa nọ ezumike nka
Nwanne ya nwoke, onye bụbu onye na-eme ihe gbasara isi nri James Leith, lụrụ onye na-ede akụkọ ndụ Penny Junor
Leith chere nkatọ ihu site n'aka otu ọrụ mmata nke a kpọrọ Beat maka aha e nyere ememe The Great British Bakeoff, “Worth the calories,” nke Beat kwenyere na ọ na-akpalite ndị nwere nsogbu iri nri
Na Mee 2020, o kwupụtara nkwado nke mmebi nke mkpọchi ije nke Dominic Cummings na Mary Wakefield,  nke nwa ya nwoke kọwara dị ka "ndị enyi ochie."
Na Disemba 2021, ọ bụ onye ọbịa na ememe diski Desert Island nke BBC Radio 4
Nkwanye ugwu a kwanyere Leith gụnyere Veuve Clicquot Nwanyị azụmahịa nke afọ na 1990 na nzere iri na atọ ma ọ bụ mkpakọrịta sitere na mahadum UK

A họpụtara ya Officer of the Order of the British Empire (OBE) na 1989, Commander of the Order of the British Empire (CBE) na 2010 Birthday Honors  na Dame Commander of the Order of the British Empire (DBE) na nsọpụrụ ụbọchị ọmụmụ 2021 maka ọrụ maka nri, mgbasa ozi na ọrụ ebere
